thread.title: Miami Heat's Gerald Green fined $25,000
thread.title_full: Miami Heat's Gerald Green fined $25,000 - UPI.com

author: upi.com
title: Miami Heat's Gerald Green fined $25,000
text:
Miami guard Gerald Green was fined $25,000 on Friday for making menacing gestures during the Heat's 110-105 preseason win over the Washington Wizards on Wednesday night at AmericanAirlines Arena in Miami.
Green made throat-slash gestures after hitting two 3-pointers in the fourth quarter while rallying the Heat. He finished with 28 points off the bench.
The eight-year NBA veteran signed a one-year, $1.36 million deal with the Heat during the summer. He averaged 11.9 points, 2.5 rebounds and 1.2 assists in 74 games for the Phoenix Suns last season.
Green has career averages of 10.2 points, 2.5 rebounds and 1.0 assists in 428 games. A former first-round draft choice by the Boston Celtics, Green has also played in the NBA Development League and in Russia and China.
  Bulls' Hinrich fined $25,000 NBA: Miami 88, Boston 85 Celtics' Garnett suspended for Game 2 Charlotte rookie Morrison fined $25,000
